channel.title: Client Background Image
channel.description: ok im using a 317 source and cleint. so normally you would change the background image of the client by going to the sprites and looking for the image but in my client theres a folder called image packer then images in images it has the images but it doesnt have the background client image and i cant seem to find it anywhere please help me i also have teamveiwer if anyone can fix it over that for me

item.title: Client Background Image
item.dc:creator: @RelicFX RelicFX
item.description:
@RelicFX wrote:

  1. GGo into client
    open sprites folder
    Change background.jpg/png go your background

NOTE : your background need the same name like the background in the sprites folder

exemple is the background on sprites background.jpg than your background has to be background.jpg eather to replace it

Read full topic
